CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 38 In this contribution , we reported a new series of donor polymer materials based on benzodithiophene ( BDT ) and difluorinated dialkylthienylbenzothiadiazole , PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , or 16 ) , which exhibited strong aggregation behavior in both solution and thin films.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| benzodithiophene (BDT) |
| PffBB-n |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| benzodithiophene (BDT) |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

(Note: "this contribution" and "which exhibited" do not refer to material names)
